experience.aboutCompany: JLS Trading Company is an Amazon Seller Partner which manages private label brands in nearly every consumer category from toys to tools to office products to gourmet food. I worked closely with Process Managers and Product Officers to implement mainly in-house solutions to optimize business processes.

projects.name: JLS ERP
projects.about:
A SaaS product that enables users to track warehouse or factory inventory, employees, and assets. Built standalone components in React Typescript for the front-end application of the new SaaS product. Wrote exhaustive unit and integration tests in Jest and Enzyme. Wrote documentation for standalone component packages.
The company is on track to release the first public beta of the SaaS product. This project is spearheading the company's efforts to diversify its operations.

projects.name: Warehouse Digitization
projects.about:
Led the effort to automate and optimize warehouse processes. Developed algorithms in Typescript for optimizing warehouse traversal when fulfilling pick lists. Developed algorithms in Typescript for generating digital addresses for areas within warehouses. Performed exhaustive unit and integration testing with Jest.
Slashed fuel costs by 35% and order fulfillment time drastically. Improved inventory management by warehouse zoning.

experience.aboutCompany: Wink Initiatives is a collaborative company that explores ideas of young people and helps to develop them into businesses and initiatives that help the community. I led a team of 4 developers to build a blood donation app as part of the company's social initiatives.

projects.name: Pints App
projects.about: Pint is a mobile app that has the primary function of taking requests from people who need blood donation, matching the blood group of the requester with eligible donors on the app, exchanging contacts between the wiling donor and the blood requester, allowing people to volunteer as blood donors (on standby to be contacted whenever there is an urgent need). This is to help people who are in dire need of blood find people who are willing to donate blood.The early demos of the application attracted investor and media attention as well as the Ghana Medical Association.

experience.aboutCompany: Asqii LLC is a software development company based in Kumasi, Ghana. I worked closely with Engineering Managers to strategize product design and implementation.

projects.name: Asset Manager NCA
projects.about: Developed bespoke fixed asset management software for the National Communications Authority of Ghana using React, Typescript, Express, and TypeORM according to MVC architecture. Provisioned a CI/CD pipeline with Gitlab CI and Heroku. Performed exhaustive unit and integration testing with Jest and Enzyme. Deployed on a Linux server and performed technical training and troubleshooting on the developed asset management system.

experience.aboutCompany: A marketplace app for listing and booking of 3rd party logistics truck services.

projects.name: Truckr Component Library + Website
projects.about: Developed reusable components in Vue and React for company projects. Translated UI design, animations, and mockups in Figma into web components. Performed extensive unit testing with Jest and Enzyme. Led the documentation of the component library. Composed the company's website from the created component library.

experience.aboutCompany: Quest Systems is a software development agency based in Accra, Ghana which develops bespoke software solutions for its clients. I was assigned to a hospital information system project.

projects.name: Lab Information System Middleware
projects.about: Worked a team of interns to develop and deploy middleware in Java with HAPI to interface the Hospitalrun Hospital Information System and a hematology analyzer using the HL7 standard.

experience.aboutCompany: The Association of Computer Engineering Students is a student group representing the interests of Computer Engineering students in Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology. I led a team of 4 developers delegating tasks in weekly sprints.

projects.name: ACES Website
projects.about: Designed and defined a design system for ACES. Designed a custom WordPress theme, developed and maintained the website and blog of the Association of Computer Engineering Students in the Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology.
